author: larryi
msg: Port Apache routines to decode and normalize the URI from IIS. Also, block
access to META-INF and refactor the error response handling a little.

author: ccain
msg: Minor cleanup of SSL standalone instructions and comments, mostly to remove
outdated java.security provider step. Revamped tomcat-ssl-howto.html to

author: costin
msg: Fix loading of jaxp, it had an extra '/' after the jar name ( bad cut&paste)

author: costin
msg: Modules ( == trusted contexts, including tomcat-add on services ) can now add classes to
the container and common loader. That eliminate a lot of configuration effort and provides a
very simple mechanism to add libs, using regular war files.
Note that nothing is changed in tomcat operation if no module is included ( the current
case ), it should operate exactly as before.
